IF(NOT MSVC)
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -O2\
 -Wno-reorder\
 -Wno-dangling-else\
 -Wno-division-by-zero")
ENDIF(NOT MSVC)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/3rdparty/bwapilib")

FILE(GLOB SRCS *.cpp)
ADD_LIBRARY(bwem ${SRCS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(bwem bwapilib)
SET_PROPERTY(TARGET bwem PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
